citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The most current semi-annual report to the Institutional Official (IO) signed by the majority of the IACUC members was
not available for review at the time of inspection. Signed semi-annual reports to the IO ensure that the IACUC has
performed their oversight responsibilities and are keeping the IO informed about the animal care and use program. The
facility must ensure the required documentation is available for review at the time of inspection.
Correct at the date of the next semi annual review (expected June 2023).
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The most current semi-annual report to the Institutional Official (IO) signed by the majority of the IACUC members was 
not available for review at the time of inspection.  Signed semi-annual reports to the IO ensure that the IACUC has 
performed their oversight responsibilities and are keeping the IO informed about the animal care and use program.  The 
facility must ensure the required documentation is available for review at the time of inspection. 
 
Correct at the date of the next semi annual review (expected June 2023). 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
